form.label: Phishing Kit Tracker
form.description: Tracking phishing kits and all things related. (Site: https://github.com/neonprimetime/PhishingKitTracker, Rate Limit: None)

search.query: | rest/servicesNS/-/-/data/lookup-table-files | fields title | search title="*PhishingKitTracker.csv" | eval date=mvindex(split(title, "_"), 0) | table date | sort - date

| inputlookup $time_constraint$_PhishingKitTracker.csv | search "$ioc_type$"="$ioc$" | eval _time=strptime(DateFound, "%m/%d/%Y") | table _time DateFound Target PhishingDomain KitName KitHash KitMailer ThreatActor ThreatActorEmail EmailType ReferenceLink | timechart count span=1d

| inputlookup $time_constraint$_PhishingKitTracker.csv | fillnull value="-" | search NOT Target=- | search "$ioc_type$"="$ioc$" | table DateFound Target PhishingDomain KitName KitHash KitMailer ThreatActor ThreatActorEmail EmailType ReferenceLink | top 20 Target showperc=false | sort - count

| inputlookup $time_constraint$_PhishingKitTracker.csv | fillnull value="-" | search NOT KitName=- | search "$ioc_type$"="$ioc$" | table DateFound Target PhishingDomain KitName KitHash KitMailer ThreatActor ThreatActorEmail EmailType ReferenceLink | top 20 KitName showperc=false | sort - count

| inputlookup $time_constraint$_PhishingKitTracker.csv | fillnull value="-" | search NOT KitHash=- | search "$ioc_type$"="$ioc$" | table DateFound Target PhishingDomain KitName KitHash KitMailer ThreatActor ThreatActorEmail EmailType ReferenceLink | top 20 KitHash showperc=false | sort - count

| inputlookup $time_constraint$_PhishingKitTracker.csv | fillnull value="-" | search NOT ThreatActor=- | search "$ioc_type$"="$ioc$" | table DateFound Target PhishingDomain KitName KitHash KitMailer ThreatActor ThreatActorEmail EmailType ReferenceLink | top 20 ThreatActor showperc=false | sort - count

| inputlookup $time_constraint$_PhishingKitTracker.csv | fillnull value="-" | search NOT ThreatActorEmail=- | search "$ioc_type$"="$ioc$" | table DateFound Target PhishingDomain KitName KitHash KitMailer ThreatActor ThreatActorEmail EmailType ReferenceLink | top 20 ThreatActorEmail showperc=false | sort - count

| inputlookup $time_constraint$_PhishingKitTracker.csv | fillnull value="-" | search NOT EmailType=- | search "$ioc_type$"="$ioc$" | table DateFound Target PhishingDomain KitName KitHash KitMailer ThreatActor ThreatActorEmail EmailType ReferenceLink | top 20 EmailType showperc=false | sort - count
